report.title: A Lift from Dysphoria
report.author: NN
report.bodytext: After first week taking moclobemide (Aurorix), I notice quick improvement in mood, sleep, and interest of things. /n /n Aurorix practically has no anticholinergic effect, no sedative effect, virtually non toxic to the liver. /n /n As it is a RIMA, with the therapeutic dose, there is no need for food restriction. /n /n I tried most antidepressants, but found this one works well for me. /n /n It relieves my dysphoric feeling.
